item.title: New blog post, a silly one this time
item.description: This is so dumb I had to write about it. More dumb posts about computers and sexuality to follow... rubs hands together...

item.title: Fiddled around in the reading log section... again
item.description: I think I'm coming down with a cold or something. :^(

item.title: New reading log entry!
item.description: I also added a picture of my bookshelf because I thought that'd be fun. I think I might make a Space Odyssey shrine for funsies sometime...

item.title: New reading log entry + other minor tweaks
item.description: Added an image of my action figures and my recently completed HAL 9000 model kit from Moebius Models to the index. He looks a bit rough in person due to my very amateur modelkit skills, but he makes me happy nonetheless. Perhaps one day I will make his twin sister, SAL 9000, via the magic of 3D printing.

item.title: Reading log up!
item.description: Yay... The art page is soon to follow. :P I also nested the Commonplace page inside of it.

item.title: Long time, no see! New blog entry + video section on index page
item.description: Technical issues and school stuff prevented me from updating sooner... oops. Hopefully we're back in full swing now. Also, I did some minor tweaks on the "About" page.

item.title: New blog entry + updated the "now" section
item.description: I just remembered that I technically made this site in 2022 (when my Neocities account was created)... Though, I started actually doing stuff with this site in 2024, so I don't know what date is more appropriate to have in my footer. Anyway, new stuff.

item.title: New blog entry + some additional changes
item.description: Updates will be a bit more spread out now that class is back in session. I added a "now" section to the index as well; a little blurb to disclose what I'm watching, reading, and playing at the moment. Beneath that, I added a "new post" preview. I've heard that this is a lot more streamline to do with something like 11ty, but I'm doing it with raw HTML for now. Also adjusted the width of the comments box and where the link to the index page is on the navbar since that was bugging me... happy almost September!

item.title: Comment widget now live!
item.description: Jesus fuck, that took forever. My IDE randomly stopped syncing correctly and I had to push it to GitHub several times before hard resetting Codium for the widget to work. Actual hell on earth. "Share and enjoy," Ã la the Sirius Cybernetics Corporation.

item.title: New blog entry + rearranged some things
item.description: I remembered that I can just make separate HTML files for each entry rather than make one gigantic blog file. I think I'll just stick to that. Expect a guestbook or some sort of comment widget soon, and perhaps an archive of my first layout whenever I figure out how I want to showcase it.

item.title: Blog section is up!
item.description: Now to figure out how to add tags and make it not clunky... If anyone knows how to make static blogging pages a bit more convenient, do share. I might just bite the bullet and just post stuff on an external site, but where's the fun in that?

item.title: Things look different around here...
item.description: Wow! It's so empty and generic! I decided to give my site a huge overhaul after a year of not updating it. It was far too daunting when it was all fancy-like... It'll start having more character eventually, but I needed a blank slate. Mind the mess.

item.title: RSS feed now up
item.description: Finally added an RSS feed to this site, rather than an ever-expanding wall of text for updates. Was rather clunky. This is a test... cheers to making websites and whatnot.
